short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy premium checkers: single/multiplayer with custom avatars, pro rules & managed player interactions. Checkers Elite - play now!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Checkers Elite is an engaging and immersive checkers game that lets you challenge yourself against a smart computer AI or compete with players from around the world in multiplayer mode. Customize your gaming experience by choosing a unique player name and creating a personalized avatar. Dive into the world of checkers, follow professional rules, and sharpen your skills by tracking your overall wins, losses, and performance statistics against each opponent, presented as both raw numbers and percentages. Make connections by favoriting players you enjoy competing with, or maintain a comfortable gaming environment by muting or blocking players as needed. Join Checkers Elite today and become a true checkers champion!

Help us improve and maintain Checkers Elite for you!
No donation amount is too small - every little bit helps.
